title: I Tried To Become A Famous Drag Queen | UnConventional
description: In this video, Max Fosh tries to become a famous drag queen by attending drag shows, getting a makeover, and performing on stage.
summary: Max Fosh attempts to break into the world of drag by immersing himself in the culture and trying his hand at performing.
payoff: The payoff comes when Max finally gets on stage in full drag, only to realize that being a drag queen is much harder than he initially thought. The audience's reactions and Max's own struggles add to the humor of the situation.
